description:

To be honest, I think most of it went down Gavin's throat anyway, but you gotta give Teo props for trying something new!
You might have to replay the cumshot over and over as you watch Gavin squirt just as Teo fills his mouth! What Timing!
title: Gavin Walters & Teo - RAW
